channel.title: HP bar not showing in Wilderness Rep++
channel.description:
Hey,
So today I was working on my server and I was in the wilderness and I was attacked by a monster. I was attacking it thinking ok, it's just a small glitch, so then I went down to lower wilderness and it did the same thing. So I don't know what to do or even where to look. If you could tell me where to look I would be able to fix it myself. Thanks!

item.title: HP bar not showing in Wilderness Rep++
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:8, topic:406952”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=503935.msg3687840#msg3687840 date=1311953399]

[quote author=escalation link=topic=503935.msg3687803#msg3687803 date=1311951924]
It’s going to be something with your client… check your sprites make sure the Hitpoints 1 and hitpoints 2 are there. Or something named hitpoints.
[/quote]We don’t have the new HP bars and I think that the HP bar in the old RS was drawn with java.

Base?
[/quote]Project Insanity

Sorry i should’ve been more specific. Source? I know Hybrid PvP V2 had a problem with HP bars.[/quote]It’s the original PI all dupes fixed I think from RewnServer

Read full topic
item.source: HP bar not showing in Wilderness Rep++
